mapper.select: select license_id as licenseId, organization_id as organizationid, license_type as licenseType, product_name as productName, license_max as licenseMax, license_allocated as licenseAllocated from t_licenses where license_id = #{licenseid} and organization_id = #{organizationid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_licenses (license_id, organization_id, license_type, product_name, license_max, license_allocated) values ( #{licenseId}, #{organizationId}, #{licenseType}, #{productName}, #{licenseMax}, #{licenseAllocated})
